LanguageData.Yokai_Nurikabe.label: Nurikabe
LanguageData.Yokai_Nurikabe.description: A rare yokai that does not inhabit the wild. Rigid and durable, this living rock wall does not require food to sustain itself. \n However, due to its rocky existence, neither meat or leather can be extracted from it.
LanguageData.Yokai_Nurikabe.tools.0.label: left hand
LanguageData.Yokai_Nurikabe.tools.1.label: right hand
LanguageData.Yokai_Nurikabe_Corpse.label: Nurikabe corpse
